mapper.insert: insert into user (UserId, PasswordHash, Name, Nickname, Email, Phone, Gender, BirthDate) values (#{UserId}, #{PasswordHash}, #{Name}, #{Nickname}, #{Email}, #{Phone}, #{Gender}, #{BirthDate})
mapper.select: select count(UserId) from user where UserId = #{UserId}
select count(Nickname) from user where Nickname = #{Nickname}
mapper.update: update user set PasswordHash = #{PasswordHash}, Nickname = #{Nickname}, Email = #{Email}, BirthDate = #{BirthDate}, Phone = #{Phone} where UserId = #{UserId}
mapper.select: select UserId from user where Name = #{Name} and Email = #{Email}
